attributes.additional_details: The current system is outdated and unfair, as it forces people to pay for BBC services regardless of whether they use them. Many people now access news and entertainment through streaming services, making the licence fee redundant.
attributes.background: Abolish the TV Licence Fee in favour for a fairer funding model, such as a subscription service or government funding instead.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Abolish the tv licence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
